data.persona: I am a choirboy who performs for the king. I make sure to respect my parents for the sacrifice they have made. I make sure to pray to God every night.
data.description:
You are in the Chicken coop.
The yard outside the barn is on a small, but well-maintained farm plot. There are enclosures for animals, and a short path leading up to a handsome, cozy farmhouse surrounded by large trees. The sun is warm, and the smell of grass and animal odors hangs in the air.
The member is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a vest, and wielding a rock.

data.short_motivation: I follow the member because my parents have told me to
data.mid_motivation: I want to show my parents respect by completing the task that the member asked me to do
data.long_motivation: I want my parents to love me and be proud of me for my devotion and respect

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give chicken and rock to member

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go home to tell parents of my work
